data.title: Josiah Trager — Hermes Law
data.text:
I was born and raised in Brooklyn, New York and spent much of my high school years as a professional actor. I then attended Vassar College (Go Brewers) and NYU School of Law (Go Violets) for law school. I have practiced in Texas, California and New York, primarily handling litigation matters, but also handling transactional, intellectual property and bankruptcy matters.

I love spending time with my amazing daughter and when I can, enjoy mysteries and dry British comedy, solving puzzles, cooking and swimming. I have even been known to play a hand or two of poker.

“Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.”

—George Santanya;

“Those who understand history are condemned to watch other idiots repeat it.”

—Peter Lamborn Wilson
